SELECT

FROM facebookinsightsownposts
WHERE
  $__timeFilter("time")
ORDER BY 1

SELECT
  "time" AS "time",
  post_video_view_time
FROM facebookinsightsownposts
WHERE
  $__timeFilter("time")
ORDER BY 1

DECLARE profiles STRING;
SET profiles = ("$query0");
EXECUTE IMMEDIATE format("""WITH filter_month_profiles as (SELECT
   REPLACE(REPLACE(REPLACE(REPLACE(REPLACE(REPLACE(REPLACE(REPLACE(REPLACE(REPLACE(REPLACE(REPLACE(REPLACE(REPLACE(REPLACE(REPLACE(profile,'-',''),' ',''),',',''),'ä','ae'),'Ä','Ae'),'ö','oe'),'Ö','Oe'),'ü','ue'),'Ü','Ue'),'.',''),'!',''),'&',''),"'",""),'#',''),'🍀',''),'ß','ss') as profile,
   SUM(page_engaged_users) AS engagedUsers,
   CONCAT(EXTRACT(MONTH from time),'-',EXTRACT(YEAR from time)) as month_year
 FROM `ndr-code-bi-dashboard.$dataset.facebookInsights` AS facebook
 JOIN `ndr-code-bi-dashboard.Quintly.profiles` AS profiles
   ON facebook.profileId = profiles.facebookID
 WHERE profiles.LRA = "$LRA"
   AND EXTRACT(MONTH from time) = $Monat
   AND EXTRACT(YEAR from time) = $Jahr
 GROUP BY profile, month_year), filter_month_top_profiles as (
 SELECT
   month_year,
   profile,
   engagedUsers,
   ROW_NUMBER() OVER (PARTITION BY month_year ORDER BY engagedUsers DESC) AS profile_rank
 FROM filter_month_profiles
), filter_month_top_8_profiles AS (
 SELECT
   month_year,
   profile,
   engagedUsers
 FROM filter_month_top_profiles
 WHERE profile_rank <= 8
 ), filter_month_rest AS (
 SELECT
   month_year,
   'Rest' AS profile,
   SUM(engagedUsers) AS engagedUsers
 FROM filter_month_top_profiles
 WHERE profile_rank > 8
 GROUP BY month_year
), filter_month_top_8_rest_profiles AS (
  SELECT
   month_year,
   profile,
   engagedUsers
 FROM filter_month_top_8_profiles
 UNION ALL
 SELECT
   month_year,
   profile,
   engagedUsers
 FROM filter_month_rest
 ORDER BY month_year DESC, profile
),privous_months_profiles AS (
 SELECT
   CONCAT(EXTRACT(MONTH from time),'-',EXTRACT(YEAR from time)) as month_year,
   REPLACE(REPLACE(REPLACE(REPLACE(REPLACE(REPLACE(REPLACE(REPLACE(REPLACE(REPLACE(REPLACE(REPLACE(REPLACE(REPLACE(REPLACE(REPLACE(profile,'-',''),' ',''),',',''),'ä','ae'),'Ä','Ae'),'ö','oe'),'Ö','Oe'),'ü','ue'),'Ü','Ue'),'.',''),'!',''),'&',''),"'",""),'#',''),'🍀',''),'ß','ss') as profile,
   SUM(page_engaged_users) AS engagedUsers
 FROM `ndr-code-bi-dashboard.$dataset.facebookInsights` AS facebook
 JOIN `ndr-code-bi-dashboard.Quintly.profiles` AS profiles
   ON facebook.profileId = profiles.facebookID
 WHERE profiles.LRA = "$LRA"
   AND EXTRACT(DATE FROM time) >= DATE_SUB(DATE($Jahr, $Monat, 1), INTERVAL 1 YEAR)
   AND EXTRACT(DATE FROM time) <= LAST_DAY(DATE_SUB(DATE($Jahr, $Monat, 1), INTERVAL 1 MONTH), MONTH)
 GROUP BY profile, month_year
), privous_months_top_8_profiles AS (
 SELECT
   month_year,
   profile,
   engagedUsers
 FROM privous_months_profiles
 WHERE profile IN ($top_8_profiles)
 ), privous_months_rest AS (
 SELECT
   month_year,
   'Rest' AS profile,
   SUM(engagedUsers) AS engagedUsers
 FROM privous_months_profiles
 WHERE profile NOT IN ($top_8_profiles )
 GROUP BY month_year), privous_months_top_8_rest_profiles AS (
  SELECT
   month_year,
   profile,
   engagedUsers
 FROM privous_months_top_8_profiles
 UNION ALL
 SELECT
   month_year,
   profile,
   engagedUsers
 FROM privous_months_rest
 ORDER BY month_year DESC, profile)
--SELECT * FROM privous_months_top_8_rest_profiles
SELECT
*
FROM (
 SELECT
   DATE(CAST(SPLIT(month_year, '-')[OFFSET(1)] AS INT64), CAST(SPLIT(month_year, '-')[OFFSET(0)] AS INT64), 1) as month_year ,
   FORMAT_DATE('%%B %%Y', DATE(CAST(SPLIT(month_year, '-')[OFFSET(1)] AS INT64), CAST(SPLIT(month_year, '-')[OFFSET(0)] AS INT64), 1)) AS formatted_date,
   profile,
   ROUND(engagedUsers / (DATE_DIFF(LAST_DAY(DATE(CAST(SPLIT(month_year, '-')[OFFSET(1)] AS INT64),CAST(SPLIT(month_year, '-')[OFFSET(0)] AS INT64),1),MONTH),DATE(CAST(SPLIT(month_year, '-')[OFFSET(1)] AS INT64),CAST(SPLIT(month_year, '-')[OFFSET(0)] AS INT64),1),DAY) + 1)) as engagedUsers
 FROM filter_month_top_8_rest_profiles
 UNION ALL
 SELECT
   DATE(CAST(SPLIT(month_year, '-')[OFFSET(1)] AS INT64), CAST(SPLIT(month_year, '-')[OFFSET(0)] AS INT64), 1) as month_year,
   FORMAT_DATE('%%B %%Y', DATE(CAST(SPLIT(month_year, '-')[OFFSET(1)] AS INT64), CAST(SPLIT(month_year, '-')[OFFSET(0)] AS INT64), 1)) AS formatted_date,
   profile,
   ROUND(engagedUsers / (DATE_DIFF(LAST_DAY(DATE(CAST(SPLIT(month_year, '-')[OFFSET(1)] AS INT64),CAST(SPLIT(month_year, '-')[OFFSET(0)] AS INT64),1),MONTH),DATE(CAST(SPLIT(month_year, '-')[OFFSET(1)] AS INT64),CAST(SPLIT(month_year, '-')[OFFSET(0)] AS INT64),1),DAY) + 1)) as engagedUsers
 FROM privous_months_top_8_rest_profiles
 ORDER BY month_year DESC, profile
)
PIVOT(SUM(engagedUsers) FOR profile IN (%s))""", profiles);

WITH filter_month_profiles as (SELECT
   REPLACE(REPLACE(REPLACE(REPLACE(REPLACE(REPLACE(REPLACE(REPLACE(REPLACE(REPLACE(REPLACE(REPLACE(REPLACE(REPLACE(REPLACE(REPLACE(profile,'-',''),' ',''),',',''),'ä','ae'),'Ä','Ae'),'ö','oe'),'Ö','Oe'),'ü','ue'),'Ü','Ue'),'.',''),'!',''),'&',''),"'",""),'#',''),'🍀',''),'ß','ss') as profile,

   AND EXTRACT(MONTH from time) = $Monat

 GROUP BY profile, month_year), filter_month_top_profiles as (

), filter_month_top_8_profiles AS (
 SELECT
   month_year,
   profile,
   engagedUsers
 FROM filter_month_top_profiles
 WHERE profile_rank <= 8
 ), filter_month_rest AS (
 SELECT
   month_year,
   'Rest' AS profile,
   SUM(engagedUsers) AS engagedUsers
 FROM filter_month_top_profiles
 WHERE profile_rank > 8
 GROUP BY month_year
), filter_month_top_8_rest_profiles AS (
  SELECT
   month_year,
   profile,
   engagedUsers
 FROM filter_month_top_8_profiles
 UNION ALL
 SELECT
   month_year,

 FROM filter_month_rest

SELECT profile, ROUND(engagedUsers/(DATE_DIFF(LAST_DAY(DATE($Jahr,$Monat,1),MONTH),DATE($Jahr,$Monat,1),DAY) + 1)) as engagedUsers FROM filter_month_top_8_rest_profiles

SELECT
  SUM(IFNULL(page_actions_post_reactions_total_like + page_actions_post_reactions_total_love + 
  page_actions_post_reactions_total_wow + page_actions_post_reactions_total_haha + 
  page_actions_post_reactions_total_sorry + page_actions_post_reactions_total_anger +
  page_positive_feedback_by_type_comment + page_positive_feedback_by_type_link,0))/1000000 as interactionsMill,

  DATE(EXTRACT(YEAR from time),EXTRACT(MONTH from time), 1) as month
  
FROM `ndr-code-bi-dashboard.$dataset.facebookInsights` as facebook
JOIN `ndr-code-bi-dashboard.Quintly.profiles` as profiles ON (facebook.profileId = profiles.facebookID AND profiles.LRA = "$LRA")
-- Daten des ausgewählten Zeitraums minus 1 Jahr
WHERE DATE(EXTRACT(YEAR from time),EXTRACT(MONTH from time), 1) <= DATE($Jahr, $Monat, 1) AND DATE(EXTRACT(YEAR from time),EXTRACT(MONTH from time), 1)  >= DATE_SUB(DATE($Jahr, $Monat, 1), INTERVAL 12 MONTH) 
GROUP BY month
ORDER BY month ASC

SELECT
  "time" AS "time",
  post_video_view_time
FROM facebookinsightsownposts
WHERE
  $__timeFilter("time")
ORDER BY 1

SELECT
  "time" AS "time",
  post_video_view_time
FROM facebookinsightsownposts
WHERE
  $__timeFilter("time")
ORDER BY 1

SELECT
  SUM(IFNULL(page_actions_post_reactions_total_like + page_actions_post_reactions_total_love + 
  page_actions_post_reactions_total_wow + page_actions_post_reactions_total_haha + 
  page_actions_post_reactions_total_sorry + page_actions_post_reactions_total_anger,0)) as Reaktionen,

  SUM(IFNULL(page_positive_feedback_by_type_comment, 0)) as Kommentare,

  SUM(IFNULL(page_positive_feedback_by_type_link, 0)) as Shares, --Zählen diese als shares?,
  
FROM `ndr-code-bi-dashboard.$dataset.facebookInsights` as facebook
JOIN `ndr-code-bi-dashboard.Quintly.profiles` as profiles ON (facebook.profileId = profiles.facebookID AND profiles.LRA = "$LRA")
AND EXTRACT(MONTH from time) = $Monat AND EXTRACT(YEAR from time) = $Jahr

SELECT CONCAT(REPEAT(" ", $filled_size_headline - CHAR_LENGTH('Summe')), 'Summe')
FROM(
SELECT 'Summe' as Gesamt
)

SELECT CONCAT(REPEAT(" ", $filled_size_headline - CHAR_LENGTH('Ø Pro Tag')), 'Ø Pro Tag')
FROM(
SELECT 'Ø Pro Tag' as Gesamt
)

SELECT CONCAT(REPEAT(" ", $filled_size_headline - CHAR_LENGTH(CONCAT("$Monat_abkuerzung", " $Jahr"))), CONCAT("$Monat_abkuerzung", " $Jahr"))
FROM(
SELECT CONCAT("$Monat_abkuerzung", " $Jahr") as Gesamt
)

SELECT
lm_interactions,
lm_interactions/(DATE_DIFF(LAST_DAY(DATE($Jahr,$Monat,1),MONTH),DATE($Jahr,$Monat,1),DAY) + 1) as lm_interactionsPerDay
FROM
(SELECT
  SUM(IFNULL(page_actions_post_reactions_total_like + page_actions_post_reactions_total_love + 
  page_actions_post_reactions_total_wow + page_actions_post_reactions_total_haha + 
  page_actions_post_reactions_total_sorry + page_actions_post_reactions_total_anger +
  page_positive_feedback_by_type_comment + page_positive_feedback_by_type_link,0))/1000000 as lm_interactions,
  
  FROM `ndr-code-bi-dashboard.$dataset.facebookInsights` as facebook
  JOIN `ndr-code-bi-dashboard.Quintly.profiles` as profiles ON (facebook.profileId = profiles.facebookID AND profiles.LRA = "$LRA")
  AND EXTRACT(MONTH from time) = $Monat AND EXTRACT(YEAR from time) = $Jahr
)

SELECT CONCAT(REPEAT(" ", $filled_size_headline - CHAR_LENGTH(CONCAT("$Monat_abkuerzung", " $Jahr"))), CONCAT("$Monat_abkuerzung", " $Jahr"))
FROM(
SELECT CONCAT("$Monat_abkuerzung", " $Jahr") as Gesamt
)

WITH past_value_in_mil AS(
  SELECT
  SUM(IFNULL(page_actions_post_reactions_total_like + page_actions_post_reactions_total_love + 
  page_actions_post_reactions_total_wow + page_actions_post_reactions_total_haha + 
  page_actions_post_reactions_total_sorry + page_actions_post_reactions_total_anger +
  page_positive_feedback_by_type_comment + page_positive_feedback_by_type_link,0))/1000000 as past_sum_in_mil,
  FROM `ndr-code-bi-dashboard.$dataset.facebookInsights` as facebook
  JOIN `ndr-code-bi-dashboard.Quintly.profiles` as profiles ON (facebook.profileId = profiles.facebookID AND profiles.LRA = "$LRA")
  WHERE True
  AND EXTRACT(MONTH from time) = EXTRACT(MONTH from DATE_SUB(DATE($Jahr,$Monat,1), INTERVAL 1 MONTH)) AND EXTRACT(YEAR from time) = EXTRACT(YEAR from DATE_SUB(DATE($Jahr,$Monat,1), INTERVAL 1 MONTH))
), past_value_per_day AS(
  SELECT past_sum_in_mil/(DATE_DIFF(LAST_DAY(DATE_SUB(DATE($Jahr,$Monat,1),INTERVAL 1 MONTH),MONTH),DATE_SUB(DATE($Jahr,$Monat,1),INTERVAL 1 MONTH),DAY) + 1) AS past_sum_per_day
  FROM past_value_in_mil
), current_value_in_mil AS(
  SELECT
  SUM(IFNULL(page_actions_post_reactions_total_like + page_actions_post_reactions_total_love + 
  page_actions_post_reactions_total_wow + page_actions_post_reactions_total_haha + 
  page_actions_post_reactions_total_sorry + page_actions_post_reactions_total_anger +
  page_positive_feedback_by_type_comment + page_positive_feedback_by_type_link,0))/1000000 as current_sum_in_mil,
  FROM `ndr-code-bi-dashboard.$dataset.facebookInsights` as facebook
  JOIN `ndr-code-bi-dashboard.Quintly.profiles` as profiles ON (facebook.profileId = profiles.facebookID AND profiles.LRA = "$LRA")
  AND EXTRACT(MONTH from time) = $Monat AND EXTRACT(YEAR from time) = $Jahr
), current_value_per_day AS(
  SELECT current_sum_in_mil/(DATE_DIFF(LAST_DAY(DATE($Jahr,$Monat,1),MONTH),DATE($Jahr,$Monat,1),DAY) + 1) AS current_sum_per_day
  FROM current_value_in_mil
)
SELECT (current_sum_in_mil/past_sum_in_mil - 1)*100 as diff_mil, (current_sum_per_day/past_sum_per_day - 1)*100 as diff_per_day FROM past_value_in_mil, current_value_in_mil, current_value_per_day, past_value_per_day

SELECT CONCAT("$Monat_abkuerzung", " $Jahr") as Gesamt

  SELECT past_sum_in_mil/(DATE_DIFF(LAST_DAY(DATE_SUB(DATE($Jahr,$Monat,1),INTERVAL 1 YEAR),MONTH),DATE_SUB(DATE($Jahr,$Monat,1),INTERVAL 1 YEAR),DAY) + 1) AS past_sum_per_day

  JOIN `ndr-code-bi-dashboard.Quintly.profiles` as profiles ON (facebook.profileId = profiles.facebookID AND profiles.LRA = "$LRA")
  WHERE True
  AND EXTRACT(MONTH from time) = $Monat AND EXTRACT(YEAR from time) = $Jahr
), current_value_per_day AS(
  SELECT current_sum_in_mil/(DATE_DIFF(LAST_DAY(DATE($Jahr,$Monat,1),MONTH),DATE($Jahr,$Monat,1),DAY) + 1) AS current_sum_per_day
  FROM current_value_in_mil
)
SELECT (current_sum_in_mil/past_sum_in_mil - 1)*100 as diff_mil, (current_sum_per_day/past_sum_per_day - 1)*100 as diff_per_day FROM past_value_in_mil, current_value_in_mil, current_value_per_day, past_value_per_day

SELECT
  SUM(IFNULL(page_video_views_10s,0))/1000000 as videoViews10sMill,
  DATE(EXTRACT(YEAR from time),EXTRACT(MONTH from time), 1) as month,
 
FROM `ndr-code-bi-dashboard.$dataset.facebookInsights` as facebook
JOIN `ndr-code-bi-dashboard.Quintly.profiles` as profiles ON (facebook.profileId = profiles.facebookID AND profiles.LRA = "$LRA")
WHERE DATE(EXTRACT(YEAR from time),EXTRACT(MONTH from time), 1) <= DATE($Jahr, $Monat, 1) AND DATE(EXTRACT(YEAR from time),EXTRACT(MONTH from time), 1)  >= DATE_SUB(DATE($Jahr, $Monat, 1), INTERVAL 12 MONTH) 
GROUP BY month
ORDER BY month ASC

SELECT
  "time" AS "time",
  post_video_view_time
FROM facebookinsightsownposts
WHERE
  $__timeFilter("time")
ORDER BY 1

SELECT
  "time" AS "time",
  post_video_view_time
FROM facebookinsightsownposts
WHERE
  $__timeFilter("time")
ORDER BY 1

WITH filter_month_profiles as (SELECT
   REPLACE(REPLACE(REPLACE(REPLACE(REPLACE(REPLACE(REPLACE(REPLACE(REPLACE(REPLACE(REPLACE(REPLACE(REPLACE(REPLACE(REPLACE(REPLACE(profile,'-',''),' ',''),',',''),'ä','ae'),'Ä','Ae'),'ö','oe'),'Ö','Oe'),'ü','ue'),'Ü','Ue'),'.',''),'!',''),'&',''),"'",""),'#',''),'🍀',''),'ß','ss') as profile,
   SUM(IFNULL(page_video_views_10s,0)) as videoViews10s,
   CONCAT(EXTRACT(MONTH from time),'-',EXTRACT(YEAR from time)) as month_year
 FROM `ndr-code-bi-dashboard.$dataset.facebookInsights` AS facebook
 JOIN `ndr-code-bi-dashboard.Quintly.profiles` AS profiles
   ON facebook.profileId = profiles.facebookID
 WHERE profiles.LRA = "$LRA"
   AND EXTRACT(MONTH from time) = $Monat
   AND EXTRACT(YEAR from time) = $Jahr
 GROUP BY profile, month_year), filter_month_top_profiles as (
 SELECT
   month_year,
   profile,
   videoViews10s,
   ROW_NUMBER() OVER (PARTITION BY month_year ORDER BY videoViews10s DESC) AS profile_rank
 FROM filter_month_profiles
), filter_month_top_8_profiles AS (
 SELECT
   month_year,
   profile,
   videoViews10s
 FROM filter_month_top_profiles
 WHERE profile_rank <= 8
 ), filter_month_rest AS (
 SELECT
   month_year,
   'Rest' AS profile,
   SUM(videoViews10s) AS videoViews10s
 FROM filter_month_top_profiles
 WHERE profile_rank > 8
 GROUP BY month_year
), filter_month_top_8_rest_profiles AS (
  SELECT
   month_year,
   profile,
   videoViews10s
 FROM filter_month_top_8_profiles
 UNION ALL
 SELECT
   month_year,
   profile,
   videoViews10s
 FROM filter_month_rest
 ORDER BY month_year DESC, profile
)
SELECT profile, videoViews10s FROM filter_month_top_8_rest_profiles

FROM(
SELECT CONCAT("$Monat_abkuerzung", " $Jahr") as Gesamt

SELECT
videoViews10sMill,
videoViews10sMill/(DATE_DIFF(LAST_DAY(DATE($Jahr,$Monat,1),MONTH),DATE($Jahr,$Monat,1),DAY) + 1) as videoViews10sMillPerDay
FROM
(SELECT
SUM(IFNULL(page_video_views_10s,0))/1000000 as videoViews10sMill

 
FROM `ndr-code-bi-dashboard.$dataset.facebookInsights` as facebook
JOIN `ndr-code-bi-dashboard.Quintly.profiles` as profiles ON (facebook.profileId = profiles.facebookID AND profiles.LRA = "$LRA")
WHERE True
AND EXTRACT(MONTH from time) = $Monat AND EXTRACT(YEAR from time) = $Jahr
)

SELECT CONCAT(REPEAT(" ", $filled_size_headline - CHAR_LENGTH(CONCAT("$Monat_abkuerzung", " $Jahr"))), CONCAT("$Monat_abkuerzung", " $Jahr"))
FROM(
SELECT CONCAT("$Monat_abkuerzung", " $Jahr") as Gesamt
)

WITH past_value_in_mil AS (
  SELECT
  SUM(IFNULL(page_video_views_10s,0))/1000000 as past_sum_in_mil,
  FROM `ndr-code-bi-dashboard.$dataset.facebookInsights` as facebook
  JOIN `ndr-code-bi-dashboard.Quintly.profiles` as profiles ON (facebook.profileId = profiles.facebookID AND profiles.LRA = "$LRA")
  WHERE True
  AND EXTRACT(MONTH from time) = EXTRACT(MONTH from DATE_SUB(DATE($Jahr,$Monat,1), INTERVAL 1 MONTH)) AND EXTRACT(YEAR from time) = EXTRACT(YEAR from DATE_SUB(DATE($Jahr,$Monat,1), INTERVAL 1 MONTH))
), past_value_per_day AS (
  SELECT past_sum_in_mil/(DATE_DIFF(LAST_DAY(DATE_SUB(DATE($Jahr,$Monat,1),INTERVAL 1 MONTH),MONTH),DATE_SUB(DATE($Jahr,$Monat,1),INTERVAL 1 MONTH),DAY) + 1) as past_sum_per_day
  FROM past_value_in_mil
), current_value_in_mil AS(
  SELECT
  SUM(IFNULL(page_video_views_10s,0))/1000000 as current_sum_in_mil,
  FROM `ndr-code-bi-dashboard.$dataset.facebookInsights` as facebook
  JOIN `ndr-code-bi-dashboard.Quintly.profiles` as profiles ON (facebook.profileId = profiles.facebookID AND profiles.LRA = "$LRA")
  WHERE True
  AND EXTRACT(MONTH from time) = $Monat AND EXTRACT(YEAR from time) = $Jahr
), current_value_per_day AS(
  SELECT current_sum_in_mil/(DATE_DIFF(LAST_DAY(DATE($Jahr,$Monat,1),MONTH),DATE($Jahr,$Monat,1),DAY) + 1) as current_sum_per_day
  FROM current_value_in_mil
)
SELECT (current_sum_in_mil/past_sum_in_mil - 1)*100 as diff_mil, (current_sum_per_day/past_sum_per_day - 1)*100 as diff_per_day FROM past_value_in_mil, current_value_in_mil, current_value_per_day, past_value_per_day

SELECT CONCAT(REPEAT(" ", $filled_size_headline - CHAR_LENGTH(CONCAT("$Monat_abkuerzung", " $Jahr"))), CONCAT("$Monat_abkuerzung", " $Jahr"))
FROM(
SELECT CONCAT("$Monat_abkuerzung", " $Jahr") as Gesamt
)

WITH past_value_in_mil AS (
  SELECT
  SUM(IFNULL(page_video_views_10s,0))/1000000 as past_sum_in_mil,
  FROM `ndr-code-bi-dashboard.$dataset.facebookInsights` as facebook
  JOIN `ndr-code-bi-dashboard.Quintly.profiles` as profiles ON (facebook.profileId = profiles.facebookID AND profiles.LRA = "$LRA")
  WHERE True
  AND EXTRACT(MONTH from time) = $Monat AND EXTRACT(YEAR from time) = $Jahr-1
), past_value_per_day AS (
  SELECT past_sum_in_mil/(DATE_DIFF(LAST_DAY(DATE_SUB(DATE($Jahr,$Monat,1),INTERVAL 1 YEAR),MONTH),DATE_SUB(DATE($Jahr,$Monat,1),INTERVAL 1 YEAR),DAY) + 1) as past_sum_per_day
  FROM past_value_in_mil
), current_value_in_mil AS(
  SELECT
  SUM(IFNULL(page_video_views_10s,0))/1000000 as current_sum_in_mil,
  FROM `ndr-code-bi-dashboard.$dataset.facebookInsights` as facebook
  JOIN `ndr-code-bi-dashboard.Quintly.profiles` as profiles ON (facebook.profileId = profiles.facebookID AND profiles.LRA = "$LRA")
  WHERE True
  AND EXTRACT(MONTH from time) = $Monat AND EXTRACT(YEAR from time) = $Jahr
), current_value_per_day AS(
  SELECT current_sum_in_mil/(DATE_DIFF(LAST_DAY(DATE($Jahr,$Monat,1),MONTH),DATE($Jahr,$Monat,1),DAY) + 1) as current_sum_per_day
  FROM current_value_in_mil
)
SELECT (current_sum_in_mil/past_sum_in_mil - 1)*100 as diff_mil, (current_sum_per_day/past_sum_per_day - 1)*100 as diff_per_day FROM past_value_in_mil, current_value_in_mil, current_value_per_day, past_value_per_day

SELECT

profile as Profil

FROM `ndr-code-bi-dashboard.$dataset.facebookInsights` as facebook

WHERE --True AND

 EXTRACT(MONTH from time) = $Monat AND EXTRACT(YEAR from time) = $Jahr
 AND page_follows IS NOT NULL

SELECT
CAST(ROUND(SUM(page_impressions_unique)/(COUNT(facebook.time))) as INT64) as impressions_unique_PerDay ,

AND EXTRACT(MONTH from time) = $Monat AND EXTRACT(YEAR from time) = $Jahr

SELECT
profile as Profil,
page_follows as followers
FROM `ndr-code-bi-dashboard.$dataset.facebookInsights` as facebook
JOIN `ndr-code-bi-dashboard.Quintly.profiles` as profiles ON (facebook.profileId = profiles.facebookID AND profiles.LRA = "$LRA")

WHERE True
AND time = (SELECT MAX(time) FROM `ndr-code-bi-dashboard.$dataset.facebookInsights` as facebook
            WHERE EXTRACT(MONTH from time) = $Monat AND EXTRACT(YEAR from time) = $Jahr)

ORDER BY followers desc

SELECT 
lm.Profil,
(lm_follower/llm_follower - 1)*100 as FollowerVeraenderung
FROM
(SELECT
page_follows lm_follower,
profile as Profil
FROM `ndr-code-bi-dashboard.$dataset.facebookInsights` as facebook
JOIN `ndr-code-bi-dashboard.Quintly.profiles` as profiles ON (facebook.profileId = profiles.facebookID AND profiles.LRA = "$LRA")

WHERE True
AND time = (SELECT MAX(time) FROM `ndr-code-bi-dashboard.$dataset.facebookInsights` as facebook
            WHERE EXTRACT(MONTH from time) = $Monat AND EXTRACT(YEAR from time) = $Jahr)

ORDER BY page_follows desc) as lm
LEFT JOIN
(SELECT
page_follows as llm_follower,
profile as Profil
FROM `ndr-code-bi-dashboard.$dataset.facebookInsights` as facebook
JOIN `ndr-code-bi-dashboard.Quintly.profiles` as profiles ON (facebook.profileId = profiles.facebookID AND profiles.LRA = "$LRA")

WHERE True
AND time = (SELECT MAX(time) FROM `ndr-code-bi-dashboard.$dataset.facebookInsights` as facebook
            WHERE EXTRACT(MONTH from time) = EXTRACT(MONTH from DATE_SUB(DATE($Jahr,$Monat,1), INTERVAL 1 MONTH)) AND EXTRACT(YEAR from time) = EXTRACT(YEAR from DATE_SUB(DATE($Jahr,$Monat,1), INTERVAL 1 MONTH)))

ORDER BY page_follows desc) as llm ON llm.Profil = lm.Profil
ORDER BY lm.lm_follower DESC

SELECT

SUM(page_video_views_10s) as videoViews10s

FROM `ndr-code-bi-dashboard.$dataset.facebookInsights` as facebook

(SELECT 
a.profile,
ROUND(a.followers/1000 + b.interactions/10) as ARD_Facebook_Score

FROM
(SELECT 
profile,
followers
  FROM `ndr-code-bi-dashboard.$dataset.facebook` as facebook
  JOIN `ndr-code-bi-dashboard.Quintly.profiles` as profiles ON (facebook.profileId = profiles.facebookID AND profiles.LRA = "$LRA")  
  WHERE True
AND time = (SELECT MAX(time) FROM `ndr-code-bi-dashboard.$dataset.facebook` as facebook
            WHERE EXTRACT(MONTH from time) = $Monat AND EXTRACT(YEAR from time) = $Jahr)
  GROUP BY profile, followers) as a,
  
(SELECT 
(ROUND (AVG(ownPostsLikes + ownPostsLove + ownPostsWow + ownPostsHaha + ownPostsSad + ownPostsAngry + ownPostsShares + ownPostsComments))) AS interactions,
profile
  FROM `ndr-code-bi-dashboard.$dataset.facebook` as facebook
  JOIN `ndr-code-bi-dashboard.Quintly.profiles` as profiles ON (facebook.profileId = profiles.facebookID AND profiles.LRA = "$LRA")
  WHERE True
  AND EXTRACT(MONTH from time) = $Monat AND EXTRACT(YEAR from time) = $Jahr
  GROUP BY profile
  ) as b
  WHERE a.profile = b.profile
  ORDER BY ARD_Facebook_Score DESC)

SELECT
lm.Profil as Profil,
(lm.ARD_Facebook_Score/llm.ARD_Facebook_Score - 1) * 100 as ARDScore_Veraenderung

FROM(SELECT 
a.profile as Profil,
ROUND(a.followers/1000 + b.interactions/10) as ARD_Facebook_Score

FROM
(SELECT 
profile,
followers
  FROM `ndr-code-bi-dashboard.$dataset.facebook` as facebook
  JOIN `ndr-code-bi-dashboard.Quintly.profiles` as profiles ON (facebook.profileId = profiles.facebookID AND profiles.LRA = "$LRA")  
  WHERE True
AND time = (SELECT MAX(time) FROM `ndr-code-bi-dashboard.$dataset.facebook` as facebook
            WHERE EXTRACT(MONTH from time) = $Monat AND EXTRACT(YEAR from time) = $Jahr)
  GROUP BY profile, followers) as a,
  
(SELECT 
(ROUND (AVG(ownPostsLikes + ownPostsLove + ownPostsWow + ownPostsHaha + ownPostsSad + ownPostsAngry + ownPostsShares + ownPostsComments))) AS interactions,
profile
  FROM `ndr-code-bi-dashboard.$dataset.facebook` as facebook
  JOIN `ndr-code-bi-dashboard.Quintly.profiles` as profiles ON (facebook.profileId = profiles.facebookID AND profiles.LRA = "$LRA")
  WHERE True
  AND EXTRACT(MONTH from time) = $Monat AND EXTRACT(YEAR from time) = $Jahr
  GROUP BY profile
  ) as b
  WHERE a.profile = b.profile
  ORDER BY ARD_Facebook_Score DESC) as lm
  LEFT JOIN
  (SELECT 
a.profile as Profil,
ROUND(a.followers/1000 + b.interactions/10) as ARD_Facebook_Score

FROM
(SELECT 
profile,
followers
  FROM `ndr-code-bi-dashboard.$dataset.facebook` as facebook
  JOIN `ndr-code-bi-dashboard.Quintly.profiles` as profiles ON (facebook.profileId = profiles.facebookID AND profiles.LRA = "$LRA") 
  WHERE True
AND time = (SELECT MAX(time) FROM `ndr-code-bi-dashboard.$dataset.facebook` as facebook
            WHERE EXTRACT(MONTH from time) = EXTRACT(MONTH from DATE_SUB(DATE($Jahr,$Monat,1), INTERVAL 1 MONTH)) AND EXTRACT(YEAR from time) = EXTRACT(YEAR from DATE_SUB(DATE($Jahr,$Monat,1), INTERVAL 1 MONTH)))
  GROUP BY profile, followers) as a,
  
(SELECT 
(ROUND (AVG(ownPostsLikes + ownPostsLove + ownPostsWow + ownPostsHaha + ownPostsSad + ownPostsAngry + ownPostsShares + ownPostsComments))) AS interactions,
profile
  FROM `ndr-code-bi-dashboard.$dataset.facebook` as facebook
  JOIN `ndr-code-bi-dashboard.Quintly.profiles` as profiles ON (facebook.profileId = profiles.facebookID AND profiles.LRA = "$LRA")
  WHERE True
  AND EXTRACT(MONTH from time) = EXTRACT(MONTH from DATE_SUB(DATE($Jahr,$Monat,1), INTERVAL 1 MONTH)) AND EXTRACT(YEAR from time) = EXTRACT(YEAR from DATE_SUB(DATE($Jahr,$Monat,1), INTERVAL 1 MONTH))
  GROUP BY profile
  ) as b
  WHERE a.profile = b.profile
  ORDER BY ARD_Facebook_Score DESC) as llm
  ON lm.Profil = llm.Profil
  ORDER BY lm.ARD_Facebook_Score DESC

(SELECT 
a.profile,
CASE
WHEN a.profile = "NDR Hamburg" THEN ROUND((a.followers/1000 + b.interactions/10)*0.64516129)
WHEN a.profile = "NDR Niedersachsen" THEN ROUND((a.followers/1000 + b.interactions/10)*0.14714538)
WHEN a.profile = "NDR Schleswig-Holstein" THEN ROUND((a.followers/1000 + b.interactions/10)*0.40420372)
WHEN a.profile = "NDR Mecklenburg-Vorpommern" THEN ROUND((a.followers/1000 + b.interactions/10)*0.71942446) END as ARD_Facebook_Score

FROM
(SELECT 
profile,
followers
  FROM `ndr-code-bi-dashboard.Quintly.facebook` as facebook
  JOIN `ndr-code-bi-dashboard.Quintly.profiles` as profiles ON (facebook.profileId = profiles.facebookID AND profiles.LRA = "$LRA")  
  WHERE True
AND time = (SELECT MAX(time) FROM `ndr-code-bi-dashboard.$dataset.facebook` as facebook
            WHERE EXTRACT(MONTH from time) = $Monat AND EXTRACT(YEAR from time) = $Jahr)
  GROUP BY profile, followers) as a,
  
(SELECT 
(ROUND (AVG(ownPostsLikes + ownPostsLove + ownPostsWow + ownPostsHaha + ownPostsSad + ownPostsAngry + ownPostsShares + ownPostsComments))) AS interactions,
profile
  FROM `ndr-code-bi-dashboard.Quintly.facebook` as facebook
  JOIN `ndr-code-bi-dashboard.Quintly.profiles` as profiles ON (facebook.profileId = profiles.facebookID AND profiles.LRA = "$LRA")
  WHERE True
  AND EXTRACT(MONTH from time) = $Monat AND EXTRACT(YEAR from time) = $Jahr
  GROUP BY profile
  ) as b
  WHERE a.profile = b.profile AND a.profile IN UNNEST(["NDR Hamburg", "NDR Niedersachsen", "NDR Schleswig-Holstein", "NDR Mecklenburg-Vorpommern"])
  ORDER BY ARD_Facebook_Score DESC)

-- Interaktionen pro Post und Anzahl Posts

SELECT
Profil, Interaktionen as InteraktionenProPost
--CAST(ROUND(Interaktionen/(DATE_DIFF(LAST_DAY(DATE($Jahr,$Monat,1),MONTH),DATE($Jahr,$Monat,1),DAY) + 1)) AS INT64) AS InteraktionenProPost

FROM
(SELECT 
profile as Profil,
sum(page_actions_post_reactions_total_like + page_actions_post_reactions_total_love + 
  page_actions_post_reactions_total_wow + page_actions_post_reactions_total_haha + 
  page_actions_post_reactions_total_sorry + page_actions_post_reactions_total_anger +
  page_positive_feedback_by_type_comment + page_positive_feedback_by_type_link) as Interaktionen
FROM `ndr-code-bi-dashboard.$dataset.facebookInsights` as facebook
JOIN `ndr-code-bi-dashboard.Quintly.profiles` as profiles ON (facebook.profileId = profiles.facebookID AND profiles.LRA = "$LRA")
WHERE True
AND EXTRACT(MONTH from time) = $Monat AND EXTRACT(YEAR from time) = $Jahr
GROUP by profile)
ORDER BY InteraktionenProPost DESC

WITH interaktionenProPost AS (SELECT 
profile as Profil,
sum(page_actions_post_reactions_total_like + page_actions_post_reactions_total_love + 
  page_actions_post_reactions_total_wow + page_actions_post_reactions_total_haha + 
  page_actions_post_reactions_total_sorry + page_actions_post_reactions_total_anger +
  page_positive_feedback_by_type_comment + page_positive_feedback_by_type_link) as Interaktionen
FROM `ndr-code-bi-dashboard.$dataset.facebookInsights` as facebook
JOIN `ndr-code-bi-dashboard.Quintly.profiles` as profiles ON (facebook.profileId = profiles.facebookID AND profiles.LRA = "$LRA")
WHERE True
AND EXTRACT(MONTH from time) = $Monat AND EXTRACT(YEAR from time) = $Jahr
GROUP by profile)
-- Interaktionen pro Post und Anzahl Posts
SELECT Profil, anzahlPosts FROM(
SELECT
t2.Profil,
SUM(anzahlPosts) as anzahlPosts,
MAX(t2.Interaktionen) as Interaktionen

FROM
(SELECT 
profile as Profil,
COUNT(DISTINCT externalId) as anzahlPosts,
FROM `ndr-code-bi-dashboard.$dataset.facebookInsightsOwnPosts` as facebook
JOIN `ndr-code-bi-dashboard.Quintly.profiles` as profiles ON (facebook.profileId = profiles.facebookID AND profiles.LRA = "$LRA")
WHERE True
AND EXTRACT(MONTH from time) = $Monat AND EXTRACT(YEAR from time) = $Jahr
GROUP BY profile
UNION ALL
SELECT
profile as Profil,
COUNT(DISTINCT externalId) as anzahlPosts
FROM `ndr-code-bi-dashboard.$dataset.facebookInsightsExpiredPosts` as facebook
JOIN `ndr-code-bi-dashboard.Quintly.profiles` as profiles ON (facebook.profileId = profiles.facebookID AND profiles.LRA = "$LRA")
WHERE True
AND EXTRACT(MONTH from time) = $Monat AND EXTRACT(YEAR from time) = $Jahr
GROUP BY profile) as t1
JOIN (SELECT 
Profil,
Interaktionen from interaktionenProPost) as t2 ON t1.Profil = t2.Profil
GROUP BY t2.Profil
--ORDER BY CAST(ROUND(Interaktionen/(DATE_DIFF(LAST_DAY(DATE($Jahr,$Monat,1),MONTH),DATE($Jahr,$Monat,1),DAY) + 1)) AS INT64)  DESC
)
ORDER by Interaktionen desc

options.content: Legende:  🖼️ = Bild    🎥 = Video    🔗 = Link    📕 = Album    📄 = Status

targets.rawSql:
SELECT
  "time" AS "time",
  post_video_view_time
FROM facebookinsightsownposts
WHERE
  $__timeFilter("time")
ORDER BY 1

-- TODO: Left Join mit facebookInsightsOwnVideos für Spalte 10s views

SELECT 
profile as Profil,
facebook.time as PostDatum,
message as Post,
facebook.link,
type as Typ,
post_reactions_by_type_total_like	+ post_reactions_by_type_total_love	+ 
  post_reactions_by_type_total_wow + post_reactions_by_type_total_haha + 
  post_reactions_by_type_total_sorry	+ post_reactions_by_type_total_anger + 
  post_activity_by_action_type_share + post_activity_by_action_type_comment as Interaktionen,

post_reactions_by_type_total_like	+ post_reactions_by_type_total_love	+ 
  post_reactions_by_type_total_wow + post_reactions_by_type_total_haha + 
  post_reactions_by_type_total_sorry	+ post_reactions_by_type_total_anger as Reaktionen,

  post_activity_by_action_type_comment as Kommentare,

  post_activity_by_action_type_share as Shares,
  total_video_10s_views
  

FROM `ndr-code-bi-dashboard.$dataset.facebookInsightsOwnPosts` as facebook
JOIN `ndr-code-bi-dashboard.Quintly.profiles` as profiles ON (facebook.profileId = profiles.facebookID AND profiles.LRA = "$LRA")
LEFT JOIN `ndr-code-bi-dashboard.$dataset.facebookInsightsOwnVideos`as videos ON facebook.objectId = videos.externalId
WHERE True
AND CASE WHEN facebook.objectId = videos.externalId THEN True
                     ELSE TRUE END

AND EXTRACT(MONTH from facebook.time) = $Monat AND EXTRACT(YEAR from facebook.time) = $Jahr
ORDER BY Interaktionen DESC

options.content: Legende:  🖼️ = Bild    🎥 = Video    🔗 = Link    📕 = Album    📄 = Status

targets.rawSql:
SELECT
  "time" AS "time",
  post_video_view_time
FROM facebookinsightsownposts
WHERE
  $__timeFilter("time")
ORDER BY 1

SELECT DISTINCT
  profile,
  PostDatum,
  Post,
  link,
  Typ,
  Interaktionen,
  Reaktionen,
  Kommentare,
  Shares,
  total_video_10s_views 
FROM (
  SELECT 
    profiles.profile,
    facebook.time as PostDatum,
    message as Post,
    facebook.link,
    type as Typ,
    post_reactions_by_type_total_like + post_reactions_by_type_total_love + 
      post_reactions_by_type_total_wow + post_reactions_by_type_total_haha + 
      post_reactions_by_type_total_sorry  + post_reactions_by_type_total_anger + 
      post_activity_by_action_type_share + post_activity_by_action_type_comment as Interaktionen,
    post_reactions_by_type_total_like + post_reactions_by_type_total_love + 
      post_reactions_by_type_total_wow + post_reactions_by_type_total_haha + 
      post_reactions_by_type_total_sorry  + post_reactions_by_type_total_anger as Reaktionen,
    post_activity_by_action_type_comment as Kommentare,
    post_activity_by_action_type_share as Shares,
    total_video_10s_views,
    ROW_NUMBER() OVER (PARTITION BY profiles.facebookID ORDER BY 
      post_reactions_by_type_total_like + post_reactions_by_type_total_love + 
      post_reactions_by_type_total_wow + post_reactions_by_type_total_haha + 
      post_reactions_by_type_total_sorry  + post_reactions_by_type_total_anger + 
      post_activity_by_action_type_share + post_activity_by_action_type_comment DESC) as row_num
  FROM `ndr-code-bi-dashboard.$dataset.facebookInsightsOwnPosts` as facebook
  JOIN `ndr-code-bi-dashboard.Quintly.profiles` as profiles ON (facebook.profileId = profiles.facebookID AND profiles.LRA = "$LRA")
  LEFT JOIN `ndr-code-bi-dashboard.$dataset.facebookInsightsOwnVideos` as videos ON facebook.objectId = videos.externalId
  WHERE True
  AND CASE 
    WHEN facebook.objectId = videos.externalId THEN True
    ELSE TRUE 
  END
  AND EXTRACT(MONTH from facebook.time) = $Monat 
  AND EXTRACT(YEAR from facebook.time) = $Jahr
) as subquery
WHERE row_num = 1
ORDER BY Interaktionen DESC

WITH followers as (
  SELECT 
lm.Profil,
lm_follower as followers,
lm_follower-llm_follower as FollowerVeraenderungAbsolut,
(SAFE_DIVIDE(lm_follower,llm_follower)-1)*100 as FollowerVeraenderung
FROM
(SELECT
page_follows lm_follower,
profile as Profil
FROM `ndr-code-bi-dashboard.$dataset.facebookInsights` as facebook
JOIN `ndr-code-bi-dashboard.Quintly.profiles` as profiles ON (facebook.profileId = profiles.facebookID AND profiles.LRA = "$LRA")

AND time = (SELECT MAX(time) FROM `ndr-code-bi-dashboard.$dataset.facebookInsights` as facebook
            WHERE EXTRACT(MONTH from time) = $Monat AND EXTRACT(YEAR from time) = $Jahr)

ORDER BY page_follows desc) as lm
LEFT JOIN
(SELECT

JOIN `ndr-code-bi-dashboard.Quintly.profiles` as profiles ON (facebook.profileId = profiles.facebookID AND profiles.LRA = "$LRA")

ORDER BY page_follows desc) as llm ON llm.Profil = lm.Profil

), aktive_nutzer_per_tag_und_interaktionen as (

lm_Interaktionen as Interaktionen,
lm_Interaktionen - llm_Interaktionen as InteraktionenVeraenderungAbsolut,
(SAFE_DIVIDE(lm_Interaktionen,llm_Interaktionen)-1)*100 as InteraktionenVeraenderung,
lm_potenzielle_reichweite as PotenzielleReichweite,
lm_potenzielle_reichweite - llm_potenzielle_reichweite as PotenzielleReichweiteVeraenderungAbsolut,
(SAFE_DIVIDE(lm_potenzielle_reichweite,llm_potenzielle_reichweite)-1)*100 as PotenzielleReichweiteVeraenderung
FROM

profile as Profil,
SUM(IFNULL(page_actions_post_reactions_total_like + page_actions_post_reactions_total_love + 
  page_actions_post_reactions_total_wow + page_actions_post_reactions_total_haha + 
  page_actions_post_reactions_total_sorry + page_actions_post_reactions_total_anger +

FROM `ndr-code-bi-dashboard.$dataset.facebookInsights` as facebook

WHERE True

AND EXTRACT(MONTH from time) = $Monat AND EXTRACT(YEAR from time) = $Jahr
AND page_follows is not null
GROUP BY profile
ORDER BY lm_aktive_nutzer desc
) as lm
LEFT JOIN
(SELECT
CAST(ROUND(SUM(page_engaged_users)/COUNT(time)) as INT64) as llm_aktive_nutzer ,
profile as Profil,
SUM(IFNULL(page_actions_post_reactions_total_like + page_actions_post_reactions_total_love + 
  page_actions_post_reactions_total_wow + page_actions_post_reactions_total_haha + 
  page_actions_post_reactions_total_sorry + page_actions_post_reactions_total_anger +
  page_positive_feedback_by_type_comment + page_positive_feedback_by_type_link,0)) as llm_Interaktionen,
CAST(ROUND(SUM(page_impressions_unique)/COUNT(time)) as INT64) as llm_potenzielle_reichweite

FROM `ndr-code-bi-dashboard.$dataset.facebookInsights` as facebook

WHERE True

AND page_follows is not null
GROUP BY profile
ORDER BY llm_aktive_nutzer desc
) as llm ON llm.Profil = lm.Profil
ORDER BY lm.lm_aktive_nutzer,lm.lm_Interaktionen, lm_potenzielle_reichweite DESC
), video_start as (

) as llm ON llm.Profil = lm.Profil
ORDER BY lm.lm_videoViews10s, lm.lm_videoViews3s DESC
), ard_facebook_score as (
SELECT
lm.Profil as Profil,
lm.ARD_Facebook_Score as ARD_facebook_score,
lm.ARD_Facebook_Score-llm.ARD_Facebook_Score as ARDScore_VeraenderungAbsolut,
(SAFE_DIVIDE(lm.ARD_Facebook_Score,llm.ARD_Facebook_Score)-1)*100 as ARDScore_Veraenderung

FROM(SELECT 
a.profile as Profil,
ROUND(a.followers/1000 + b.interactions/10) as ARD_Facebook_Score

FROM
(SELECT 
profile,
followers
  FROM `ndr-code-bi-dashboard.$dataset.facebook` as facebook
  JOIN `ndr-code-bi-dashboard.Quintly.profiles` as profiles ON (facebook.profileId = profiles.facebookID AND profiles.LRA = "$LRA")

AND time = (SELECT MAX(time) FROM `ndr-code-bi-dashboard.$dataset.facebook` as facebook
            WHERE EXTRACT(MONTH from time) = $Monat AND EXTRACT(YEAR from time) = $Jahr)
  GROUP BY profile, followers) as a,
  
(SELECT

profile

  WHERE True
  AND EXTRACT(MONTH from time) = $Monat AND EXTRACT(YEAR from time) = $Jahr
  GROUP BY profile
  ) as b
  WHERE a.profile = b.profile
  ORDER BY ARD_Facebook_Score DESC) as lm
  LEFT JOIN
  (SELECT 
a.profile as Profil,
ROUND(a.followers/1000 + b.interactions/10) as ARD_Facebook_Score

FROM
(SELECT 
profile,
followers
  FROM `ndr-code-bi-dashboard.$dataset.facebook` as facebook
  JOIN `ndr-code-bi-dashboard.Quintly.profiles` as profiles ON (facebook.profileId = profiles.facebookID AND profiles.LRA = "$LRA") 
  WHERE True
AND time = (SELECT MAX(time) FROM `ndr-code-bi-dashboard.$dataset.facebook` as facebook
            WHERE EXTRACT(MONTH from time) = EXTRACT(MONTH from DATE_SUB(DATE($Jahr,$Monat,1), INTERVAL 1 MONTH)) AND EXTRACT(YEAR from time) = EXTRACT(YEAR from DATE_SUB(DATE($Jahr,$Monat,1), INTERVAL 1 MONTH)))
  GROUP BY profile, followers) as a,
  
(SELECT 
(ROUND (AVG(ownPostsLikes + ownPostsLove + ownPostsWow + ownPostsHaha + ownPostsSad + ownPostsAngry + ownPostsShares + ownPostsComments))) AS interactions,
profile
  FROM `ndr-code-bi-dashboard.$dataset.facebook` as facebook
  JOIN `ndr-code-bi-dashboard.Quintly.profiles` as profiles ON (facebook.profileId = profiles.facebookID AND profiles.LRA = "$LRA")
  WHERE True
  AND EXTRACT(MONTH from time) = EXTRACT(MONTH from DATE_SUB(DATE($Jahr,$Monat,1), INTERVAL 1 MONTH)) AND EXTRACT(YEAR from time) = EXTRACT(YEAR from DATE_SUB(DATE($Jahr,$Monat,1), INTERVAL 1 MONTH))
  GROUP BY profile
  ) as b
  WHERE a.profile = b.profile
  ORDER BY ARD_Facebook_Score DESC) as llm
  ON lm.Profil = llm.Profil
  ORDER BY lm.ARD_Facebook_Score DESC
)

profile
  FROM `ndr-code-bi-dashboard.$dataset.facebook` as facebook
  JOIN `ndr-code-bi-dashboard.Quintly.profiles` as profiles ON (facebook.profileId = profiles.facebookID AND profiles.LRA = "$LRA")
  WHERE True
  AND EXTRACT(MONTH from time) = EXTRACT(MONTH from DATE_SUB(DATE($Jahr,$Monat,1), INTERVAL 1 MONTH)) AND EXTRACT(YEAR from time) = EXTRACT(YEAR from DATE_SUB(DATE($Jahr,$Monat,1), INTERVAL 1 MONTH))
  GROUP BY profile
  ) as b
  WHERE a.profile = b.profile
  ORDER BY ARD_Facebook_Score DESC) as llm
  ON lm.Profil = llm.Profil
  ORDER BY lm.ARD_Facebook_Score DESC
)
SELECT followers.Profil,followers.followers, followers.FollowerVeraenderungAbsolut, followers.FollowerVeraenderung,anzahl_posts.Anzahlposts,
aktive_nutzer_per_tag_und_interaktionen.AktiveNutzer, aktive_nutzer_per_tag_und_interaktionen.AktiveNutzerVeraenderungAbsolut, aktive_nutzer_per_tag_und_interaktionen.AktiveNutzerVeraenderung,
aktive_nutzer_per_tag_und_interaktionen.Interaktionen, aktive_nutzer_per_tag_und_interaktionen.InteraktionenVeraenderungAbsolut, aktive_nutzer_per_tag_und_interaktionen.InteraktionenVeraenderung,
aktive_nutzer_per_tag_und_interaktionen.PotenzielleReichweite, aktive_nutzer_per_tag_und_interaktionen.PotenzielleReichweiteVeraenderungAbsolut, aktive_nutzer_per_tag_und_interaktionen.PotenzielleReichweiteVeraenderung,
video_start.videoViews10s, video_start.videoViews10sVeraenderungAbsolut, video_start.videoViews10sVeraenderung, video_start.videoViews3s, video_start.videoViews3sVeraenderungAbsolut, video_start.videoViews3sVeraenderung,
ard_facebook_score.ARD_facebook_score, ard_facebook_score.ARDScore_VeraenderungAbsolut, ard_facebook_score.ARDScore_Veraenderung FROM followers 
JOIN anzahl_posts ON followers.Profil = anzahl_posts.Profil
JOIN aktive_nutzer_per_tag_und_interaktionen ON followers.Profil = aktive_nutzer_per_tag_und_interaktionen.Profil
JOIN video_start ON followers.Profil = video_start.Profil
JOIN ard_facebook_score ON followers.Profil = ard_facebook_score.Profil

options.content:
# 📊 Hinweis

- Aktuell laufen in diesem Dashboard Daten ein, die regelmäßig aktualisiert werden. Ab Juni 2023 werden die Daten am 7. jedes Monats für den Vormonat endgültig gespeichert. Deswegen kann es im Vergleich mit anderen Stichtags-Erhebungen (z.B. den Berichten der Medienforschungen) Abweichungen bei den Daten geben.

query.rawSql:
SELECT
CASE EXTRACT(MONTH from DATE_SUB(DATE($Jahr,$Monat,1), INTERVAL 1 MONTH))
WHEN 1 THEN "Januar"
WHEN 2 THEN "Februar"
WHEN 3 THEN "März"
WHEN 4 THEN "April"
WHEN 5 THEN "Mai"
WHEN 6 THEN "Juni"
WHEN 7 THEN "Juli"
WHEN 8 THEN "August"
WHEN 9 THEN "September"
WHEN 10 THEN "Oktober"
WHEN 11 THEN "November"
WHEN 12 THEN "Dezember"
END

SELECT
CONCAT(
CASE EXTRACT(MONTH FROM lastMonth)
WHEN 1 THEN "Jan"
WHEN 2 THEN "Feb"
WHEN 3 THEN "Mrz"
WHEN 4 THEN "Apr"
WHEN 5 THEN "Mai"
WHEN 6 THEN "Jun"
WHEN 7 THEN "Jul"
WHEN 8 THEN "Aug"
WHEN 9 THEN "Sep"
WHEN 10 THEN "Okt"
WHEN 11 THEN "Nov"
WHEN 12 THEN "Dez"
END, FORMAT_DATE(" %y", lastMonth))

FROM
(SELECT DATE_SUB(CAST(DATE_TRUNC(MAX(last_update), MONTH) AS DATE), INTERVAL 1 MONTH) as lastMonth FROM `ndr-code-bi-dashboard.Quintly.facebook`)

WITH monthly_engaged_users AS (
  SELECT 
    REPLACE(REPLACE(REPLACE(REPLACE(REPLACE(REPLACE(REPLACE(REPLACE(REPLACE(REPLACE(REPLACE(profile,'-',''),' ',''),',',''),'ä','ae'),'Ä','Ae'),'ö','oe'),'Ö','Oe'),'ü','ue'),'Ü','Ue'),'.',''),'','') as profile, 
    SUM(page_engaged_users) AS engagedUsers,
    EXTRACT(MONTH FROM time) AS month,
  FROM `ndr-code-bi-dashboard.Quintly.facebookInsights` AS facebook
  JOIN `ndr-code-bi-dashboard.Quintly.profiles` AS profiles 
    ON facebook.profileId = profiles.facebookID
  WHERE profiles.LRA = "$LRA"
    AND last_update IN (
      SELECT MAX(last_update) 
      FROM `ndr-code-bi-dashboard.Quintly.facebookInsights` AS facebook
      JOIN `ndr-code-bi-dashboard.Quintly.profiles` AS profiles 
        ON facebook.profileId = profiles.facebookID
      WHERE profiles.LRA = "$LRA"
    )
    AND EXTRACT(DATE FROM time) >= DATE($Jahr - 2, $Monat, 1) 
    AND EXTRACT(DATE FROM time) <= LAST_DAY(DATE($Jahr, $Monat, 1), MONTH)
  GROUP BY profile, month
), top_profiles AS (
  SELECT 
    month,
    profile,
    engagedUsers,
    ROW_NUMBER() OVER (PARTITION BY month ORDER BY engagedUsers DESC) AS profile_rank
  FROM monthly_engaged_users
)
  SELECT 
    STRING_AGG(CONCAT("'", profile, "'"), ', ')
  FROM top_profiles
  WHERE profile_rank <= 8

WITH filter_month_profiles as (SELECT
    REPLACE(REPLACE(REPLACE(REPLACE(REPLACE(REPLACE(REPLACE(REPLACE(REPLACE(REPLACE(REPLACE(REPLACE(REPLACE(REPLACE(REPLACE(REPLACE(profile,'-',''),' ',''),',',''),'ä','ae'),'Ä','Ae'),'ö','oe'),'Ö','Oe'),'ü','ue'),'Ü','Ue'),'.',''),'!',''),'&',''),"'",""),'#',''),'🍀',''),'ß','ss') as profile, 
    SUM(page_engaged_users) AS engagedUsers,
    FORMAT_DATE('%m-%Y', time) AS month_year
  FROM `ndr-code-bi-dashboard.Quintly.facebookInsights` AS facebook
  JOIN `ndr-code-bi-dashboard.Quintly.profiles` AS profiles 
    ON facebook.profileId = profiles.facebookID
  WHERE profiles.LRA = "$LRA"
    AND EXTRACT(MONTH from time) = $Monat
    AND EXTRACT(YEAR from time) = $Jahr
  GROUP BY profile, month_year), filter_month_top_profiles as (
  SELECT 
    month_year,
    profile,
    engagedUsers,
    ROW_NUMBER() OVER (PARTITION BY month_year ORDER BY engagedUsers DESC) AS profile_rank
  FROM filter_month_profiles
), filter_month_top_8_profiles AS (
  SELECT 
    month_year,
    profile,
    engagedUsers
  FROM filter_month_top_profiles
  WHERE profile_rank <= 8 
  ), filter_month_rest AS (
  SELECT 
    month_year,
    'Rest' AS profile,
    SUM(engagedUsers) AS engagedUsers
  FROM filter_month_top_profiles
  WHERE profile_rank > 8
  GROUP BY month_year
), filter_month_top_8_rest_profiles AS (
   SELECT 
    month_year,
    profile,
    engagedUsers
  FROM filter_month_top_8_profiles
  UNION ALL
  SELECT 
    month_year,
    profile,
    engagedUsers
  FROM filter_month_rest
  ORDER BY month_year DESC, profile
) SELECT STRING_AGG(DISTINCT CONCAT("'", profile, "'"), ', ') FROM filter_month_top_8_rest_profiles

WITH filter_month_profiles as (SELECT
    REPLACE(REPLACE(REPLACE(REPLACE(REPLACE(REPLACE(REPLACE(REPLACE(REPLACE(REPLACE(REPLACE(REPLACE(REPLACE(REPLACE(REPLACE(REPLACE(profile,'-',''),' ',''),',',''),'ä','ae'),'Ä','Ae'),'ö','oe'),'Ö','Oe'),'ü','ue'),'Ü','Ue'),'.',''),'!',''),'&',''),"'",""),'#',''),'🍀',''),'ß','ss') as profile, 
    SUM(page_impressions_unique) AS impressionsUnique,
    CONCAT(EXTRACT(MONTH from time),'-',EXTRACT(YEAR from time)) as month_year
  FROM `ndr-code-bi-dashboard.Quintly.facebookInsights` AS facebook
  JOIN `ndr-code-bi-dashboard.Quintly.profiles` AS profiles 
    ON facebook.profileId = profiles.facebookID
  WHERE profiles.LRA = "$LRA"
    AND EXTRACT(MONTH from time) = $Monat
    AND EXTRACT(YEAR from time) = $Jahr
  GROUP BY profile, month_year), filter_month_top_profiles as (

WITH filter_month_profiles as (SELECT

SELECT

WHEN CURRENT_DATE() < DATE_ADD(DATE($Jahr,$Monat,7),INTERVAL 1 MONTH) THEN "Quintly"
WHEN LAST_DAY(DATE($Jahr,$Monat,1)) <= DATE(2023,5,31) THEN "Quintly_final_2023_5"
ELSE CONCAT("Quintly_final_",CAST($Jahr AS STRING),"_", CAST($Monat AS STRING)) END

SELECT

WHEN ($Monat = 13 AND DATE($Jahr+1, 1, 7) > CURRENT_DATE()) THEN FORMAT_DATE('%d.%m.%Y', CURRENT_DATE())
WHEN $Monat = 13 THEN CONCAT("07.01.",CAST($Jahr+1 AS STRING))
WHEN DATE_ADD(DATE($Jahr,$Monat,7), INTERVAL 1 MONTH) > CURRENT_DATE() THEN FORMAT_DATE('%d.%m.%Y', CURRENT_DATE())
ELSE 
CASE $Monat
WHEN 12 THEN CONCAT("07.01.",CAST($Jahr+1 AS STRING))
